ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:18:37 [Issue ID 4000-842165] urn:comicvine:4000-842165 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 19:55:18. [Issue ID 2214941]
ComicInfo.Summary:
IT’S A SONJA BATTLE ROYALE!!!!!
Sonja’s wage war on one another across the infinite and varied expanse of Hell. And the prize, for the war’s winner? THE CHANCE TO MURDER RED SONJA.
Ridiculous mayhem courtesy of CHRISTOPHER HASTINGS (Deadpool) and PASQUALE QUALANO (DIE!namite)!
